column3: which itself was located off the north end of the [[Twenty-first Hall]].

:Balin's Tomb is portrayed on film exactly as described in the book. The runes on the tomb are copied verbatim. [[Grant Major]] specifically tried to retain the evocative image of the shaft of light landing directly on Balin's Tomb in the film sequence. In the film
column2: Balin's Tomb is destroyed by the [[Cave-trolls|Cave-troll]] during the [[Battle of the Chamber of Mazarbul]].
